text: waymar_royce What d’you expect ? They ’re savages . One lot steals a goat from another lot and before you know it , they ’re ripping each other to pieces .
will I ’ve never seen wildlings do a thing like this . I ’ve never seen a thing like this , not ever in my life .
waymar_royce How close did you get ?
will Close as any man would .
gared We should head back to the wall .
waymar_royce Do the dead frighten you ?
gared Our orders were to track the wildlings . We tracked them . They wo n’t trouble us no more .
waymar_royce You do n’t think he ’ll ask us how they died ? Get back on your horse .
will Whatever did it to them could do it to us . They even killed the children .

waymar_royce It ’s a good thing we ’re not children . You want to run away south , run away . Of course , they will behead you as a deserter … If I do n’t catch you first . Get back on your horse . I wo n’t say it again .
waymar_royce Your dead men seem to have moved camp .
will They were here .
gared See where they went .
waymar_royce What is it ?
gared It ’s … .
jon_snow Go on . Father ’s watching .
jon_snow And your mother .
septa_mordane Fine work , as always . Well done .
sansa_stark Thank you .
septa_mordane I love the detail that you ’ve managed to get in this corners . … Quite beautiful … the stitching … .
eddard_stark And which one of you was a marksman at ten ? Keep practicing , Bran . Go on .
jon_snow Do n’t think too much , Bran .
robb_stark Relax your bow arm .
robb_stark@jon_snow Quick , Bran , faster !
rodrik_cassel Lord Stark . My lady . A guardsman just rode in from the hills . They ’ve captured a deserter from the Night ’s Watch .
eddard_stark Get the lads to saddle their horses .
catelyn_stark Do you have to ?
eddard_stark He swore an oath , Cat .
rodrik_cassel The law is law , my lady .
eddard_stark Tell Bran he ’s coming , too .
catelyn_stark Ned . Ten is too young to see such things .
eddard_stark He wo n’t be a boy forever . And winter is coming .
robb_stark Lad , go run back and get the rest .
will White Walkers . I saw the White Walkers . White Walkers . The White Walkers , I saw them .

will I know I broke my oath . And I know I ’m a deserter . I should have gone back to the Wall and warned them . But I saw what I saw . I saw the White Walkers . People need to know . If you can get word to my family , tell them I ’m no coward . Tell them I ’m sorry .
will Forgive me , lord .
eddard_stark In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon , first of his name … .
jon_snow Do n’t look away .
eddard_stark King of the Andals and the First Men … .
jon_snow Father will know if you do .
eddard_stark Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm , I , Eddard of the House Stark , Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North , sentence you to die .
jon_snow You did well .
eddard_stark You understand why I did it ?
bran_stark Jon said he was a deserter .
eddard_stark But do you understand why I had to kill him ?
bran_stark Our way is the old way ?
eddard_stark The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword .
bran_stark Is it true he saw the White Walkers ?
eddard_stark The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years .
bran_stark So he was lying ?
eddard_stark A madman sees what he sees .
jon_snow What is it ?
theon_greyjoy Mountain lion ?
eddard_stark There are no mountain lions in these woods .
theon_greyjoy It ’s a freak .
eddard_stark It ’s a direwolf .
eddard_stark Tough old beast .
robb_stark There are no direwolves south of the Wall .
jon_snow Now there are five .
jon_snow You want to hold it ?
bran_stark Where will they go ? Their mother ’s dead .
rodrik_cassel They do n’t belong down here .
eddard_stark Better a quick death . They wo n’t last without their mother .
theon_greyjoy Right . Give it here .
bran_stark NO !
robb_stark Put away your blade .
theon_greyjoy I take orders from your father , not you .
bran_stark Please , father !
eddard_stark I ’m sorry , Bran .
jon_snow Lord Stark ? There are five pups . One for each of the Stark children . The direwolf is the sigil of your House . They were meant to have them .
eddard_stark You will train them yourselves . You will feed them yourselves . And if they die , you will bury them yourselves .
bran_stark What about you ?
jon_snow I ’m not a Stark . Get on .
robb_stark What is it ?
theon_greyjoy The runt of the litter . That one ’s yours , Snow .
jaime_lannister As your brother , I feel it ’s my duty to warn you You worry too much . It ’s starting to show .
cersei_lannister And you never worry about anything . When we were seven , you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock . One hundred foot drop into the water . And you were never afraid .
jaime_lannister There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father . We ’re Lannisters . Lannisters do n’t act like fools .
cersei_lannister What if Jon Arryn told someone ?
jaime_lannister But who would he tell ?
cersei_lannister My husband .

jaime_lannister If he told the king , both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now . Whatever Jon Arryn knew or did n’t know , it died with him . And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king , someone to do his job while he ’s off fucking boars and hunting whores . Or is it the other way around ? And life will go on .
cersei_lannister You should be the Hand of the king .
jaime_lannister That ’s an honor I can do without . Their days are too long , their lives are too short .
catelyn_stark All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here .
eddard_stark You have five northern children . You ’re not an outsider .
catelyn_stark I wonder if the old gods agree .
eddard_stark It ’s your gods with all the rules .
catelyn_stark I am so sorry , my love .
eddard_stark Tell me .
catelyn_stark There was a raven from Kings Landing . Jon Arryn is dead . A fever took him . I know he was like a father to you .
eddard_stark Your sister . The boy … .
catelyn_stark They both have their health . Gods be good . The raven brought more news . The king rides for Winterfell . With the queen and all the rest of them .
eddard_stark He ’s coming this far North , there ’s only one thing he ’s after .
catelyn_stark You can always say no , Ned .
catelyn_stark We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion ’s chamber . I ’m told he reads all night .
maester_luwin I ’m told he drinks all night .
catelyn_stark How much could he possibly drink ? A man of his … stature .
maester_luwin We ’ve brought up eight barrels of ale from the cellar . Perhaps we ’ll find out .
catelyn_stark In any case , candles .
jon_snow Why ’s your mother so dead - set on us getting pretty for the king ?
theon_greyjoy It ’s for the queen , I bet . I hear she ’s .
robb_stark I hear the prince is a right royal prick .
theon_greyjoy Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick .
robb_stark Go on , Tommy , shave him good . He ’s never met a girl he likes better than his own hair .
catelyn_stark Gods , but they grow fast . Brandon !
bran_stark I saw the king ! He ’s got hundreds of people !
catelyn_stark How many times have I told you No climbing !
bran_stark But he ’s coming right now ! Down our road !
catelyn_stark I want you to promise me No more climbing .
bran_stark I promise .
catelyn_stark D’you know what ?
bran_stark What ?
catelyn_stark You always look at your feet before you lie . Run and find your father . Tell him the king is close .
catelyn_stark Where ’s Arya ? Sansa , where ’s your sister ?
eddard_stark Hey , , hey , hey , hey . What are you doing with that on ?
arya_stark Move !
eddard_stark Your Grace .
robert_baratheon You ’ve got fat .
robert_baratheon Cat !
catelyn_stark Your Grace .
robert_baratheon Nine years . Why have n’t I seen you ? Where the hell have you been ?
eddard_stark Guarding the North for you , Your Grace . Winterfell is yours .
arya_stark Where ’s the Imp ?
sansa_stark Will you shut up ?
robert_baratheon Who have we here ? You must be Robb . Your name is ?
arya_stark Arya .
arya_stark That ’s Jaime Lannister . The queen ’s twin brother .
sansa_stark Would you please shut up .
eddard_stark My queen .
catelyn_stark My queen .
robert_baratheon Take me to your crypt . I want to pay my respects .
cersei_lannister We ’ve been riding for a month , my love . Surely the dead can wait .
robert_baratheon Ned .
arya_stark Where ’s the Imp ?
cersei_lannister Where is our brother ? Go find the little beast .
eddard_stark Tell me about Jon Arryn .
robert_baratheon One minute he was fine , and then … Burned right through him , whatever it was . I loved that man .
eddard_stark We both did .
robert_baratheon He never had to teach you much , but me … You remember me at 16 ? All I wanted to do was crack skulls and fuck girls . He showed me what was what .
eddard_stark Aye .

robert_baratheon Do n’t look at me like that . Not his fault I did n’t listen . I need you , Ned . Down at Kings Landing . Not up here , where you ’re no damn use to anybody . Lord Eddard Stark , I would name you the Hand of the king .
eddard_stark I ’m not worthy of the honor .

robert_baratheon I ’m not trying to honor you . I ’m trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat , drink , and whore my way to an early grave . Damn it , Ned , stand up . You helped me win the Iron Throne , now help me keep the damn thing . We were meant to rule together . If your sister had lived , we would have been bound by blood . Well , it ’s not too late . I have a son , you have a daughter . We ’ll join our Houses .
tyrion_lannister Mmh . It is true what they say about the Northern girls .
ros Did you hear the king ’s in Winterfell ?
tyrion_lannister I did hear something about that .
ros And the queen . And her twin brother . They say that he is the most handsome man in the Seven Kingdoms .
tyrion_lannister And the other brother ?
ros The queen has two brothers ?
tyrion_lannister There ’s the pretty one . And there ’s the clever one .
ros I hear they call him the Imp .
tyrion_lannister I hear he hates that nickname .
ros Oh ? I hear he ’s more than earned it . I hear he ’s a drunken little lecher into all manner of perversions .
tyrion_lannister Clever girl .
ros We ’ve been expecting you , Lord Tyrion .
tyrion_lannister Have you ?
tyrion_lannister The gods gave me one blessing .
jaime_lannister Do n’t get up .
ros M’lord .
tyrion_lannister Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse , brother ?
jaime_lannister You ’ve much to teach me , no doubt . But our sister craves your attention .
tyrion_lannister She has odd cravings , our sister .
jaime_lannister A family trait . Now , the Starks are feasting us at sundown . Do n’t leave me alone with these people .
tyrion_lannister I ’m sorry , I ’ve begun the feast a bit early . And this is the first of many courses .
jaime_lannister I thought you might say that . But since we ’re short on time , Come on , girls . See you at sundown .
tyrion_lannister Close the door !
robert_baratheon Did you have to bury her in a place like this ? She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her .
eddard_stark She was my sister . This is where she belongs .
robert_baratheon She belonged with me .
robert_baratheon In my dreams , I kill him every night .
eddard_stark It ’s done , Your Grace . The Targaryens are gone .
robert_baratheon Not all of them .
viserys_targaryen Daenerys !
viserys_targaryen Daenerys ! There ’s our bride to be ! Look – a gift from Illyrio . Touch it . Come on . Feel the fabric . Mmmm . Is n’t he a gracious host ?
daenerys_targaryen We ’ve been his guests for over a year and he ’s never asked us for anything .

viserys_targaryen Illyrio is no fool . He knows I wo n’t forget my friends when I come into my throne . You still slouch . Let me see . I need you to be perfect today . Can you do that for me ? You do n’t want to wake the dragon , do you ?
daenerys_targaryen No .
viserys_targaryen When they write the history of my reign , sweet sister , they will say it began today .
maid It ’s too hot , my lady .
viserys_targaryen Where is he ?
illyrio_mopatis The Dothraki are not known for their punctuality .

illyrio_mopatis May I present my honored guests ? Viserys of House Targaryen , the third of his name . The rightful King of the Andals and the First Men . And his sister , Daenerys , of the House Targaryen .
illyrio_mopatis Come forward , my dear .
viserys_targaryen Where ’s he going ?
illyrio_mopatis The ceremony is over .
viserys_targaryen But he did n’t say anything . Did he like her ?
illyrio_mopatis Trust me , Your Grace . If he did n’t like her , we ’d know .
illyrio_mopatis It wo n’t be long now . Soon you will cross the Narrow Sea and take back your father ’s throne . The people drink secret toasts to your health . They cry out for their true king .
viserys_targaryen When will they be married ?
illyrio_mopatis Soon . The Dothraki never stay still for long .
viserys_targaryen Is it true they lie with their horses ?
illyrio_mopatis I would n’t ask Khal Drogo .
viserys_targaryen Do you take me for a fool ?
illyrio_mopatis I take you for a king . Kings lack the caution of common men . My apologies if I ’ve given offense .
viserys_targaryen I know how to play a man like Drogo . I give him a queen and he gives me an army .
viserys_targaryen So do I. I want us both to go home . But they took it from us . So tell me , sweet sister , how do we go home ?
daenerys_targaryen I do n’t know .
viserys_targaryen We go home with an army . With Khal Drogo ’s army . I would let his whole tribe fuck you , all 40,000 men and their horses too , if that ’s what it took .
sansa_stark Do you think Joffrey will like me ? What if he thinks I ’m ugly ?
catelyn_stark Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived .
sansa_stark He ’s so handsome .
sansa_stark When would we be married ? Soon or do we have to wait ?
catelyn_stark Hush now . Your father has n’t even said yes .
sansa_stark Why would he say no ? He ’d be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms .
catelyn_stark He ’d have to leave home . He ’d have to leave me . And so would you .
sansa_stark You left your home to come here . And I ’d be queen someday . Please make father say yes .
catelyn_stark Sansa … .
sansa_stark Please , please . It ’s the only thing I ever wanted .
benjen_stark Is he dead yet ?
jon_snow Uncle Benjen !
benjen_stark You got bigger . I rode all day . Did n’t want to leave you alone with the Lannisters . Why are n’t you at the feast ?
jon_snow Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst .
benjen_stark Well , you ’re always welcome on the wall . No bastard was ever refused a seat there .
jon_snow So take me with you when you go back .
benjen_stark Jon … .
jon_snow Father will let me if you ask him , I know he will .
benjen_stark The Wall is n’t going anywhere .
jon_snow I ’m ready to swear your oath .
benjen_stark You do n’t understand what you ’d be giving up . We have no families . None of us will ever father sons .
jon_snow I do n’t care about that .
benjen_stark You might , if you knew what it meant . … I ’d better get inside . Rescue your father from his guests . We ’ll talk later .
tyrion_lannister Your uncle ’s in the Night ’s Watch .
jon_snow What ’re you doing back there ?
tyrion_lannister Preparing for a night with your family . I ’ve always wanted to see the Wall .
jon_snow You ’re Tyrion Lannister . The queen ’s brother ?
tyrion_lannister My greatest accomplishment . You – you ’re Ned Stark ’s bastard , are n’t you ?
tyrion_lannister Did I offend you ? Sorry . You are the bastard , though .
jon_snow Lord Eddard Stark is my father .

tyrion_lannister And Lady Stark is not your mother . Making you a bastard . Let me give you some advice , bastard . Never forget what you are . The rest of the world will not . Wear it like armor . Then it can never be used to hurt you .
jon_snow What the hell do you know about being a bastard ?
tyrion_lannister All dwarves are bastards in their fathers ’ eyes .
benjen_stark You at a feast -- It ’s like a bear in a trap .
eddard_stark The boy I beheaded . Did you know him ?
benjen_stark Of course I did . Just a lad . But he was tough , Ned . A true Ranger .
eddard_stark He was talking madness . Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends .
benjen_stark The two he was with are still missing .
eddard_stark A wildling ambush .
benjen_stark Maybe . Direwolves south of the wall . Talk of the Walkers . My brother might be the next Hand to the king . Winter is coming .
eddard_stark Winter is coming .
robb_stark Uncle Benjen .
benjen_stark Robb boy . How are ye ?
robb_stark I ’m good .
cersei_lannister Yes . Lovely country .
catelyn_stark I ’m sure it ’s very grim , after Kings Landing . I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time .
cersei_lannister Hello , little dove . But you are a beauty . How old are you ?
sansa_stark Thirteen , Your Grace .
cersei_lannister You ’re tall . Still growing ?
sansa_stark I think so , Your Grace .
cersei_lannister And have you bled yet ?
sansa_stark No , Your Grace .
cersei_lannister And your dress . Did you make it ?
cersei_lannister Such talent . You must make something for me .
cersei_lannister I hear we might share a grandchild someday .
catelyn_stark I hear the same .
cersei_lannister Your daughter will do well in the capital . Such a beauty should n’t stay hidden up here forever .
eddard_stark Your pardon .
jaime_lannister I hear we might be neighbors soon . I hope it ’s true .
eddard_stark Yes , the king has honored me with his offer .
jaime_lannister I ’m sure we ’ll have a tournament to celebrate the new title , if you accept . It would be good to have you in the field . The competition has become a bit stale .
eddard_stark I do n’t fight in tournaments .
jaime_lannister No ? Getting a little old for it ?
eddard_stark I do n’t fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real , I do n’t want him to know what I can do .
jaime_lannister Well said .
sansa_stark Arya !
robb_stark Time for bed .
eddard_stark I ’m a Northman . I belong here with you , not down south in that rat ’s nest they call a capital .
catelyn_stark I wo n’t let him take you .
eddard_stark The king takes what he wants . That ’s why he ’s king .
catelyn_stark I ’ll say , ‘ Listen , fat man , you are not taking my husband anywhere . He belongs to me now . ’ .
eddard_stark How did he get so fat ?
catelyn_stark He only stops eating when it ’s time for a drink .
voice It ’s Maester Luwin , my lord .
eddard_stark Send him in .
maester_luwin Pardon , my lord , my lady . A rider in the night from your sister .
eddard_stark Stay .
catelyn_stark This was sent from the Eyrie . What ’s she doing at the Eyrie ? She has n’t been back there since her wedding .
eddard_stark What news ?
catelyn_stark She ’s fled the capital . She says Jon Arryn was murdered . By the Lannisters . She says the king is in danger .
eddard_stark She ’s fresh widowed , Cat . She does n’t know what she ’s saying .

catelyn_stark Lysa ’s head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter . Do you think she would risk her life , her son ’s life , if she was n’t certain her husband was murdered ?
maester_luwin If this news is true , and the Lannisters conspire against the throne , who but you can protect the king ?
catelyn_stark They murdered the last Hand . Now you want Ned to take the job .
maester_luwin The king rode for a month to ask Lord Stark ’s help . He ’s the only one he trusts . You swore the king an oath , my lord .
catelyn_stark He spent half his life fighting Robert ’s wars . He owes him nothing . Your father and brother rode south once on a king ’s demand .
maester_luwin A different time . Different king .
viserys_targaryen When do I meet with the Khal ? We need to begin planning the invasion .
illyrio_mopatis If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown , you shall have it .
viserys_targaryen When ?
illyrio_mopatis When their omens favor war .
viserys_targaryen I piss on Dothraki omens . I waited 17 years to get my throne back .
illyrio_mopatis A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is considered a dull affair .
jorah_mormont A small gift for the new Khaleesi . Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms .
daenerys_targaryen Thank you , ser . Are you from my country ?
jorah_mormont Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island . I served your father for many years . Gods be good , I hope to always serve the rightful king .
illyrio_mopatis Dragons ’ eggs , Daenerys . From the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai . The ages have turned them to stone , but they will always be beautiful .
daenerys_targaryen Thank you , Magister .
daenerys_targaryen She ’s beautiful . … Ser Jorah , I do n’t know how to say ‘ thank you ’ in Dothraki .
jorah_mormont There is no word for ‘ thank you ’ in Dothraki .
viserys_targaryen Make him happy .
khal_drogo No .
daenerys_targaryen Do you know the Common Tongue ?
khal_drogo No .
daenerys_targaryen Is ‘ no ’ the only word that you know ?
khal_drogo No .
sandor_clegane Rough night , Imp ?
tyrion_lannister If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other , it will be a miracle .
sandor_clegane I did n’t pick you for a hunter .
tyrion_lannister The greatest in the land . My spear never misses .
sandor_clegane It ’s not hunting if you pay for it .
robert_baratheon Are you as good with a spear as you used to be ?
eddard_stark No , but I ’m still better than you .
robert_baratheon I know what I ’m putting you through . Thank you for saying yes . I only ask you because I need you . You ’re a loyal friend . You hear me ? A loyal friend . The last one I ’ve got .
eddard_stark I hope I ’ll serve you well .
robert_baratheon You will . And I ’ll make sure you do n’t look so fucking grim all the time . Come on , boys , let ’s go kill some boar !
bran_stark Come on , you .
cersei_lannister Stop . STOP .
jaime_lannister Are you completely mad ?
cersei_lannister He saw us .
jaime_lannister It ’s all right . It ’s all right .
cersei_lannister He saw us !
jaime_lannister I heard you the first time . Quite the little climber , are n’t you ? How old are you , boy ?
bran_stark Ten .
jaime_lannister Ten .
jaime_lannister The things I do for love .
